properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Parisuddha sthalamu ati parisuddha sthalamu 2 devadidevudunnatti sthalamu 2, Ati parisuddhambaina paralokamu 2{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Prabhu yesu vaccenu a sthalamunundiye , Sthalamu lenivaduga e bhuvipai nundenu 2, Pranamu narpincenu kaluvari kondapai 2, Satru garvamanacanu sajevudai lecenu 2.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Prabhuyesu vellenataku sthalamu siddhaparacanu, Ayanundu sthalamulo manamundavalenani, Sodhana vedana bhada leni sthalamadi, A sthalamunakellutaku prayasapadudama{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Abrahamu cucenu a sthalamunu , Mose cuci vaccenu dani vaibhavambunu, Hanoku eleyalu velliri ataku, Paulu cuci vaccena mahimakara sthalamunu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Suryacandrulakkara leni sthalamu adi , Papamu cekati corani suddha sthalamadi, Gorrepilla depamai veluguniccu nacata, Jayasalulellaru sancarinturacata{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jevavrksaphalamulu dorakunatti sthalamadi , Jevanadi parucundu nellavelala, Nisedhinca badinavaru corani sthalamadi, Nityajevamonduvare pravesinturanduna{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Pandrendu punadula pattanamu adi , Pandrendu mutyamulato kattabadinadi, Pandrendu gummamula pranganamadi, Halleluya paducu aradhintumacata{/lang-eng}
